name: Priyank

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: Iâ€™m Priyank Gandhi, a Senior iOS Developer from Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. With over a decade of experience, I specialize in creating user-friendly iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI. My work focuses on building apps that are smooth, efficient, and reliable, whether starting from scratch or enhancing existing projects. I enjoy solving complex challenges and writing clean code to ensure a seamless experience for users. Iâ€™m passionate about staying updated with the latest in mobile tech and am dedicated to building innovative solutions that make a positive impact in the iOS world.

resume.tagline: I'm a mobile software engineer, iOS App Developer.
resume.description:
A seasoned iOS developer with over 10 years of experience and 15+ successful apps on the App Store.
Skilled in navigating development and submission processes, ensuring compliance with App Store policies
and design best practices. Proficient in app development, testing, and optimisation. Excels in planning,
programming, and implementing core modules from the ground up, with a strong foundation in
object-oriented programming and software.

experiences.position: Senior Software Engineer @ EInfochips (An Arrow Company)
experiences.bullets: Participated in agile development within cross-functional teams., Coordinated with project managers to meet deadlines and plan testing., "Developed IoT products, including pool systems and camera systems.", Gained knowledge in SwiftUI and reactive programming with Combine.

Led a team of four iOS developers., Conducted training sessions on coding using the MVVM architecture., Mentored team members enhancing their product knowledge and skills., Fostered a collaborative learning environment for junior developers.

experiences.position: Senior iOS Developer @ Persource Go Mobile,
experiences.bullets: Developed and maintained iOS apps focusing on Swift and Auto Layout., Strengthened expertise in SQLite databases and queries., Trained junior developers on Swift and app development best practices., Translated design plans into full app frameworks and delegated tasks Integrated mobile payment systems such as Apple Pay Billdesk and Paytm.

experiences.position: iOS Application Developer @ DRC Systems India PVT L TD
experiences.bullets: Developed iOS apps for various clients., Enhanced skills in Swift Auto Layout and API integration., Maintained existing applications and developed patches for updates.,  Utilized Agile methodologies to improve development processes.

experiences.position: iOS Application Developer @ Imobtree Solutions PVT. L TD
experiences.bullets: Developed iPhone iPad iWatch apps and Apple TV extensions., Followed Apple's Human Interface Guidelines for UI design., Designed user experiences for multiple screen sizes., Ensured compliance with App Store guidelines for rapid deployment.

education.universityPara: L.J. Computer Application, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India
